articles.author: Dean Bilton
articles.title: West Indies bring light to Test cricket on a day of impossible joy as Australia is beaten at the Gabba
articles.description: With a win for the ages at the Gabba the West Indies bring precious life to Australia's summer, their own hopes for a prosperous future and the health of Test cricket in its entirety.
articles.content:
None of this was supposed to happen. None of it seemed even remotely possible.
They weren't even meant to be playing for one, such was the biblical downpour that smashed Brisbane for almost the enti… [+5637 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
